title: Credit Card
description:
A card payment method of a particular brand or name.  Used to mark up a particular payment method and/or the financial product/service that supplies the card account.

Commonly used values:

monthlyMinimumRepaymentAmount.title: Monthly Minimum Repayment Amount
monthlyMinimumRepaymentAmount.description: The minimum payment is the lowest amount of money that one is required to pay on a credit card statement each month.
